item.title: Culture of Work
item.description: We are becoming lazy people, especially with our hands and feet and often enough; intellectually lazy too. – Pandit Nehru Boredom is the worst evil in Human life and work banishes three great evils : boredom, vice and poverty. – Candide, Voltaire Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it. – Gandhi Most of the farmers in my village keep farms in good shape and finish their work on time.
